description:
People are vanishing all around Occult Academy.  Maya hears that a Tengu is behind it, and tells Fumiaki that he needs to investigate, since it may be related to the Key of Nostradamus.  Their goal is to find the key of nostradamus and stop the prophecy.  However, Fumiaki isn`t getting into it.  "Things used to be so good," he whispers at he watches his old self on TV as the spoon-bending boy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 美し風, 吹き抜けて
